nFibers.name: number of fibers
nFibers.hint: The number of fibers per image to generate

segmentLength.name: segment length
segmentLength.hint: The length in pixels of fiber segments

alignment3D.name: alignment
alignment3D.hint: A value between 0 and 1 indicating how close fibers are to the mean direction on average

meanDirection.name: mean direction
meanDirection.hint: The average fiber direction as a 3D vector

widthChange.name: width change
widthChange.hint: The maximum segment-to-segment width change of a fiber in pixels

imageWidth.name: image width
imageWidth.hint: The width of the saved image in pixels

imageHeight.name: image height
imageHeight.hint: The height of the saved image in pixels

imageDepth.name: image depth
imageDepth.hint: The depth of the saved volume in pixels

imageBuffer.name: edge buffer
imageBuffer.hint: The size in pixels of the empty border around the edge of the image

scale.name: scale
scale.hint: Check to draw a scale bar on the image; value is the number of pixels per micron

downSample.name: down sample
downSample.hint: Check to enable down sampling; value is the ratio of final size to original size

blurRadius.name: blur radius
blurRadius.hint: Check to enable Gaussian blurring; value is the radius of the blur in pixels

noiseMean.name: noise mean
noiseMean.hint: Check to add Poisson noise; value is the Poisson mean on a scale of 0 (black) to 255 (white)

distanceFalloff.name: distance falloff
distanceFalloff.hint: Check to apply a distance filter; value controls the sharpness of the intensity falloff

cap.name: cap
cap.hint: Check to cap the intensity; value is the inclusive maximum on a scale of 0-255

normalize.name: normalize
normalize.hint: Check to normalize the intensity; value is the inclusive maximum on a scale of 0-255

bubble.name: bubble
bubble.hint: Check to apply "bubble smoothing"; value is the number of passes

swap.name: swap
swap.hint: Check to apply "swap smoothing"; number of swaps is this value times number of segments

spline.name: spline
spline.hint: Check to enable spline smoothing; value is the number of interpolated points per segment

nImages.name: number of images
nImages.hint: The number of images to generate

seed.name: seed
seed.hint: Check to fix the random seed; value is the seed
